title: Dish 3
ingredients: 339.55 ml butter or 339.55 ml margarine, softened
543.28 ml peanut butter chips (12 oz. pkg.) or 543.28 ml semi-sweet chocolate chips (12 oz. pkg.)
instructions: Heat oven to 350°.
In large mixer bowl; cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla; beat well.
Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt; gradually blend into creamed mixture. Stir in peanut butter or chocolate chips.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-9 minutes. (Do not overbake; cookies will be soft. They will puff while baking and flatten while cooling.).
Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet onto wire rack. Cool completely.

title: Classic Lasagna
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C.
In a pan, sauté the onion and garlic.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Add the tomato sauce, oregano, salt, and pepper.
In a baking dish, layer lasagna, meat, ricotta, and cheese.
Repeat until all ingredients are used, ensuring the top layer is cheese.
Cover with foil and bake in the oven for 30 minutes.
Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Let it rest for 10 minutes before serving.
description: A delicious homemade classic lasagna that will satisfy every palate.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: In a pan, sauté the onion and garlic with olive oil.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Add the curry paste, mix well.
Add coconut milk, diced red pepper, and zucchini.
Simmer for 20 minutes or until fully cooked.
Adjust salt and pepper to taste.
Serve with basmati rice.
description: A chicken curry dish rich in exotic flavors, perfect for a special dinner.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
ingredients: Red chili pepper, finely chopped, to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water according to the package instructions.
In a pan, heat the olive oil and add the sliced garlic and chili pepper.
Cook over medium heat until the garlic is golden brown.
Drain the spaghetti and add them to the pan with the aromatic oil.
Mix well and add chopped fresh parsley.
Serve hot, adding salt if necessary.
description: A classic and delicious version of spaghetti aglio e olio, a simple yet flavorful Italian dish.

title: Quinoa and Vegetable Salad
instructions: Rinse the quinoa under running water.
Cook the quinoa in salted water according to the package instructions.
In a large bowl, mix the cooked quinoa with cucumber, tomatoes, avocado, and feta.
Season with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Gently mix and serve chilled.
description: A light and nutritious salad with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and feta cheese.

title: Porcini Mushroom Risotto
instructions: In a pan, sauté the onion and garlic with 1 tablespoon of butter.
Add the porcini mushrooms and cook until golden brown.
Add the rice and toast for a couple of minutes.
Pour in the white wine and let it evaporate.
Gradually add the hot broth, stirring continuously.
Cook until the rice is al dente and creamy.
Add Parmesan, remaining butter, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Mix well and serve hot.
description: A rich and fragrant risotto made with fresh porcini mushrooms.

title: Grilled Steak
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush the steaks with olive oil and rub with crushed garlic.
Season with salt and pepper, and add rosemary sprigs.
Grill the steaks for 4-5 minutes per side for medium doneness.
Let them rest for a few minutes before serving.
description: A succulent grilled steak with flavors of rosemary and garlic.

title: Tiramisu
instructions: Separate the egg yolks from the whites and beat the yolks with sugar.
Add the mascarpone and mix until smooth.
Whip the egg whites until stiff and gently fold them into the mascarpone cream.
Quickly dip the ladyfingers in coffee and arrange them in a dish.
Pour half of the cream over the ladyfingers.
Repeat the process to create a second layer.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
Before serving, dust with cocoa powder.
description: The classic Italian tiramisu, a creamy and irresistible dessert.

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Blanch the tomatoes in boiling water, then peel and chop them.
In a pot, sauté the onion, garlic, carrot, and celery with olive oil.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes.
Pour in the vegetable broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to reduce the soup to a creamy consistency.
Adjust salt and pepper and serve with fresh basil leaves.
description: A warm and comforting soup made with fresh tomatoes and Mediterranean flavors.

title: Caprese Sandwich
instructions: Cut the rolls in half and lightly toast them.
Assemble the sandwiches with slices of mozzarella and tomato.
Add fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Serve as a quick snack or light lunch.
description: A fresh and tasty sandwich inspired by the classic Caprese salad.
